decision_conditions: The submitted Ecological Enhancement and Management Plan does not adequately demonstrate that there will be no breach of protected species legislation, particularly in relation to slow worms which are known to inhabit the surrounding area. There is also no confirmation that artificial lighting is in line with the Bat Conservation Trusts Guidance Note 08/18, to reduce impacts to local bat populations. As such, this condition cannot be discharged.

Only limited details of external lighting have been submitted and insufficient details have been provided in relation to lux levels, angling of the luminaires or confirmation of whether the lighting scheme is in line with the Bat Conservation Trusts Guidance Note 08/18. As such, it cannot be determined that the lighting is appropriate in relation to its sensitive ecological and MOL setting. As such, this condition cannot be discharged.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (External Material samples), Condition 5 (Part 4 of Preliminary Ecological Appraisal Survey), and Condition 6 (External Lighting).
